title: What is the best form of self study? - Any questions and answers - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello! Self study is nothing but studying in the way you feel comfortable. Usually, this is just like studying the text book, writing notes on your own. Self study is cultivated based on one's interest.Self study from my view, not only includes note book and a pen, it is all about referring many other books about the same topic, watching animated videos ,so that one can understand it so well (which Idid in my early years). I remember hearing that studying in the text book improves our memory more than doing it with that of the note book, and I think that is why they are colourful. Thank you!!!
Study with the help of original text books. Study at early in the morning in a peaceful atmosphere.
Just go home and open the book or note every single day At least 30 minutes.. After……if you get intereste you can continue to more then 2 hours
